name: Villnammellet
description:
"Greetings Hentai Connoisseur. I'm willing and ready to accept your $$$.
But, are you ready to put your money where your mouth is?

An open-world RPG with an unbelievable degree of freedom!
Pregnancy, lactation, training, anal, rape, bondage... it's all here!

Check out our Ci-en for more details.
https://ci-en.dlsite.com/creator/6222/article/284274
Summary

Every girl's a virgin, and every girl can be yours... if you so desire.
Our mute, faceless, nameless hero has license to do what he wants with any girl he wants... NPCs,
enemies, or otherwise! 100 different types of characters, 500 images (not including variations)...
it's the circle's biggest adventure yet!
Concept

This is a large-scale open world game where you can choose your companions at will!
There's not really much text or story, just utter freedom to fuck however and whoever your heart desires!

Rare items are hard to get, but H scenes aren't -- you can get right into the action!
